title: SOLD 1913 World Tour RPPC Giants & White Sox in Blue Rapids, Kansas
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: SOLD 1913 World Tour RPPC Giants & White Sox in Blue Rapids, Kansas
posts.post_content:
After the 1913 Major League season, and before they embarked their overseas World Tour in 1913-1914 the New York Giants and Chicago White Sox barnstormed their way across the country for a series of games.

This image was taken in Blue Rapids, Kansas on October 24, 1913 and shows the teams parading through town prior to the game. The Chicago White Sox are in the foreground and the New York Giants in the background. The White Sox are wearing their jackets, while the Giants don their sweaters.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=462526&d=1622981290[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=462527&d=1622981295[/IMG]

The story of the day can be seen here: [url]https://chapmandeadballcollection.com/portfolio/1913-world-tour-blue-rapids-kansas-1913-3/[/url]

There are several more RPPCs from that day shown on the site as well, but only this duplicate is for sale.

$SOLD
Jim I’ll take it. Send me a link to your PayPal and I’ll send payment.  [url]chromek539@gmail.com[/url]
Clint, it is yours. Please PM or email me your contact and mailing information.
